name: Among Us

reviews:
amoogus

not as fun as covid times, but still a decent game to play w friends. That's the key. Friends.

[b]Among Us came out of nowhere and quickly became one of the most iconic social deduction games of our time. It’s wild how such a simple concept, crewmates vs imposters, can create so much chaos, laughter, and betrayal all in one round. Whether you’re doing your tasks or trying to lie your way out of an emergency meeting, the tension and fun never let up.

What really makes Among Us special is how social it is. Playing with friends turns every session into a mix of mystery and comedy, and even with strangers, there’s always that thrill of trying to figure out who’s lying. The maps, customization, and new roles added over time have kept the gameplay fresh, and the art style gives it a unique charm that’s both cute and slightly creepy at times.

That said, public lobbies can be a hit or miss, especially if players leave early or don’t communicate. It really shines best with a good group. Still, Among Us remains a game that proves you don’t need insane graphics or massive budgets to be memorable. It’s simple, addicting, and honestly one of the best party games out there. Just don’t be surprised if your friends start acting sus in real life too.[/b]

Among Us is the ultimate social test. It’s goofy, it’s addictive, and it taught us one universal truth: red is always sus.
solo playing this is just opening up the gate of brainrot hell, don't play unless you have friends to play with.

People who play it are bums and can't play the game right, full of teaming bastards who don't play the game and just vote off crewmates so their imposter friend can win. I feel like adding XP and money was a huge mistake because it'll encourage this kind of cheating in the game. The game is still really good with a group of friends though.

this game used to be okay and now there's a bunch more racists and homophobes in the game. i do report every one i see, it's just upsetting. this is still a kids game, also, the amount of 18+ lobbies i've seen for the purpose of e-dating or nsfw intent is insane. needs some work to it on these kinds of things but i suppose all we can do is report them.

This game is enjoyable to play if you're trying to kill some time it's definitely one of those games you come back to when you wanna have some fun when it comes to mysteries

Rise of the Tomb Raider is a glorious call back to a gaming classic. Lara Croft is one of my favorite action heroes and thoroughly deserves this excellent installment to the already legendary franchise. p.s. Madagascar 3 is a fire movie! 10/10

This game is so much fun for as simple as it is. This game might actually be able to run decently on a potato from what I've seen. Downloaded this to have some fun while on vacation with my ten year old laptop that had rather underwhelming specs when it was new and it runs well over 80fps in 4k on it. Gameplay is simple, but engaging. Would recommend this game to anyone just looking for some fun without making things complicated!

I am super late but thought I'd leave an honest review. What a simple yet fun idea for a game, me and 5 or 6 of my friends play this game every night that we can, and it is the most fun I have all day. Even playing on the skeld 1000 times we still find new strategies and kills as crewmates and imposters. The use of roles makes the game much better, because it helps to relieve the boredom of being crewmate over and over. 10/10 game when played with friends.
It is a fun little game with very simple rules and short play sessions.
